content:
```
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

None

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting transport belts
- The agent failed to connect a transport belt from a belt-group to a burner inserter because the path was not valid. Ensure that the entities are placed in a way that a valid connection can be made.

### Errors when placing transport belts
- The agent attempted to place a transport belt next to a burner mining drill, but a burner inserter was already in the way. Ensure there is enough space and no conflicting entities before placing a transport belt.
- The agent attempted to place a transport belt but was too far away from the target position. Move closer to the target location before attempting to place the entity.
- The agent attempted to place a transport belt but did not have any in its inventory. Craft or obtain a transport belt before attempting to place it.
- The agent attempted to place a transport belt, but there was an existing object in the way. Ensure the target position is clear before attempting to place the entity.

### Errors when placing burner inserters
- The agent attempted to place a burner inserter, but there was an existing object in the way. Ensure the target position is clear before attempting to place the entity.

## NAMESPACE

No functions have been defined or variables assigned in the provided execution logs.
```
